title: Counter-Strike 2
description: For over two decades, Counter-Strike has offered an elite competitive experience, shaped by millions of players from across the globe.

title: Subnautica
description: Descend into the depths of an alien underwater world filled with wonder and peril. Craft equipment, pilot submarines and out-smart wildlife to survive.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Grand Theft Auto V for PC offers players the option to explore the award-winning world of Los Santos and Blaine County in resolutions of up to 4k and beyond.

title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
description: Master the art of destruction and gadgetry in Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege. Face intense close quarters combat and high lethality in this tactical shooter.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: You are Geralt of Rivia, mercenary monster slayer. Before you stands a war-torn, monster-infested continent you can explore at will.

title: Apex Legends
description: Conquer with character in Apex Legends, a free-to-play Hero Shooter where legendary characters with powerful abilities team up to battle for fame and fortune.

title: Dota 2
description: Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the dark future of Night City — a dangerous megalopolis obsessed with power, glamor, and ceaseless body modification.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Winner of over 175 Game of the Year Awards and recipient of over 250 perfect scores, RDR2 is the epic tale of outlaw Arthur Morgan and the infamous Van der Linde gang.

title: Elden Ring
description: THE NEW FANTASY ACTION RPG. Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.

title: Team Fortress 2
description: Nine distinct classes provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities. Constantly updated with new game modes, maps, equipment and more.

title: Call of Duty: Warzone
description: Welcome to Call of Duty: Warzone, the massive free-to-play combat arena which now features Urzikstan, Rebirth Island and Fortune’s Keep.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
description: Baldur’s Gate 3 is a story-rich, party-based RPG set in the universe of Dungeons & Dragons, offering unprecedented freedom of choice.

title: Path of Exile
description: You are an Exile, struggling to survive on the dark continent of Wraeclast, as you fight to earn power that will allow you to exact your revenge.

title: Terraria
description: Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game.

title: Stardew Valley
description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life.

title: Among Us
description: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-15 players... in space!

title: Brawlhalla
description: An epic platform fighter for up to 8 players online or local. Try casual free-for-alls, ranked matches, or invite friends to a private room.

title: Genshin Impact
description: Step into Teyvat, a vast world teeming with life and flowing with elemental energy. You and your sibling arrived here from another world.

title: Civilization VI
description: Civilization VI offers new ways to interact with your world, expand your empire across the map, advance your culture, and compete against history’s greatest leaders.

title: Destiny 2
description: Destiny 2 is an action MMO with a single evolving world that you and your friends can join anytime, anywhere, absolutely free.

title: Hades
description: Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion and Transistor.

title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: Winner of more than 200 Game of the Year Awards, Skyrim Special Edition brings the epic fantasy to life in stunning detail.

title: Hollow Knight
description: Forge your own path in Hollow Knight! An epic action adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes.

title: Rust
description: The only aim in Rust is to survive. To do this you will need to overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals for meat.

title: Overwatch 2
description: Overwatch 2 is a critically acclaimed, team-based shooter game set in an optimistic future with an evolving roster of heroes.

title: Warframe
description: Awaken as an unstoppable warrior and battle alongside your friends in this story-driven free-to-play online action game.

title: Forza Horizon 5
description: Blast off to the visually stunning, ever-evolving open world of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action in hundreds of the world’s greatest cars.

title: Portal 2
description: The Perpetual Testing Initiative has been expanded to allow you to design co-op puzzles for you and your friends!

title: Left 4 Dead 2
description: Set in the zombie apocalypse, Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2) is the highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning Left 4 Dead, the #1 co-op game of 2008.

title: Need for Speed Unbound
description: Race to the top, definitely don't flop. Outsmart the cops, and enter weekly qualifiers for The Grand: the ultimate street race.

title: Need for Speed Heat
description: Hustle by day and risk it all at night in Need for Speed Heat, a white-knuckle racer that pits you against a city's rogue police force.

title: Need for Speed Hot Pursuit Remastered
description: Feel the thrill of the chase and the rush of escape in Need for Speed Hot Pursuit Remastered on PC. Unleash a savage sense of speed both as an outlaw and a cop.

title: Need for Speed Most Wanted
description: To be the Most Wanted, you’ll need to outrun the cops, outdrive your friends, and outsmart your rivals.

title: Need for Speed Rivals
description: Welcome to Redview County, where a street-racing rivalry between cops and racers never stops as both sides compete in an all-out war featuring the fastest cars.

title: Need for Speed Payback
description: Set in the underworld of Fortune Valley, you and your crew were divided by betrayal and reunited by revenge to take down The House, a nefarious cartel.

title: Need for Speed (2015)
description: Discover the nocturnal open world of urban car culture, driven by Five Ways to Play, in this thrilling reboot of the Need for Speed franchise.

title: Need for Speed: Shift
description: A focused simulation-style racing game that delivers a true driver’s experience with realistic physics, pixel-perfect car models, and a wide range of tracks.

title: Need for Speed Undercover
description: You are an undercover cop tasked with infiltrating a ruthless international crime syndicate. Chase down criminals and evade the police in high-speed highway battles.

title: Shift 2 Unleashed
description: The sequel to NFS: Shift, this entry brings the true driver’s experience to life with all the intensity and exhilaration of being behind the wheel of the world's fastest cars.

title: EA SPORTS FC™ 24
description: The new era of the world's game, featuring HyperMotionV technology and PlayStyles optimized by Opta, delivering unparalleled realism on the pitch.

title: NBA 2K24
description: Experience the past, present, and future of hoops culture with innovative gameplay and an expansive MyCAREER mode to create your own legacy.

title: eFootball™ 2024
description: A free-to-play football simulation focusing on realism, offering the ultimate competitive environment with updated teams and continuous content.

title: Seas of Strife
description: Braking Point returns in a gripping new chapter, delivering high-stakes drama and fierce rivalries in the world of Formula 1.

title: WWE 2K24
description: Wrestling simulation with a loaded roster, iconic match types like Ambulance and Casket matches, and the star-studded 40 Years of WrestleMania Showcase.
